    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>2a479cad-81e9-4da6-8e58-8be3b2b883db#1#7</entry>

          <title>
            <string language="hu">Henger, kúp</string>
            <string language="en">Cylinder, cone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zylinder, Kegel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cylindre, cône</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cilindro, cone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cilindro, cono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύλινδρος, κώνος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cilindro, cono</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Henger, kúp és gömb térfogata, felszíne</string>
            <string language="en">The volume and area of the cylinder, the cone and the sphere</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">henger, kúp</string>
            <string language="en">cylinder, cone</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Datenträger und der Bereich des Zylinders, 
des Kegels und des Bereichs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le volume et la zone du cylindre, du cône et de 
la sphère</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O volume e a área do cilindro, do cone e da 
esfera</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il volume e la zona del cilindro, del cono e della
sfera</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ένταση του ήχου και η περιοχή του κυλίνδρου, του 
κώνου και της σφαίρας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El volumen y el área del cilindro, del cono y de
la esfera</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zylinder, Kegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cylindre, cône</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cilindro, cone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cilindro, cono</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cilindro, cono</string>
          </keyword>

            <value>yes</value>

          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

        <metaMetadata>

            <entity>begin:vcard
